.. _proxy:

Proxy
=====

.. py:class:: Proxy

    Proxy des


.. py:class:: Future

    Extends object

    .. py:method:: get(timeout)

        Description

        :param timeout: Timeout in secs for the request. Default to 1.

        :return: The instance of the call.

    .. py:method:: add_callback(callback)

        Description

        :param callback: Which method to callback.


.. py:class:: TellWrapper

    Wrapper for tell queries

.. py:class:: AskWrapper

    Wrapper for ask queries
